title: Jin Yu Shu Nian - Novel Updates
genre: Historical   Josei   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Ancient China   Arranged Marriage   Female Protagonist
author: Hai Qing Na Tian Er   Sea Blue Swan   海青拿天鹅
description: As warlords reign a chaotic empire, Lady Fu Jin of the fallen clan gets married to Wei Tan, eldest son of the most powerful of them all. To survive in these troubled times, she would manage both family and business affair. Amidst love and hate, family strife, and separation, can Ah Jin hold onto her husband’s hand? Vivid historical style, refreshing and subtle, deftly written.>
